name: Natural: Avoid Nested Programs using Parameter Data Areas with too many parameters
description: Will make a count on the actual parameters that a Data areas contains. The number is a threshold (initial value 10) and can be changed at will. The value reported will be 1 to indicate PDA found. A parameter is considered the level 2 of a structure  (**DK in source code), excluding the Redefines and redefine structures.
rationale: For maintainability and readability reasons, artifacts should not have too many parameters.
remediation: Review the design of the artifacts to reduce number of parameters.
total: Number of Nested Programs ( read Subprograms)

technicalCriteria.name: Complexity - Algorithmic and Control Structure Complexity
